name: Space Crumpets
overview: In this SEUCK game by Richard Bayliss you blast away at the enemy ships in your crumpet shaped space ship. Space Crumpets is a zany space shoot 'em up for 1 or 2 players. Your crumpets have been fired out into deep space. Its mission, to repair Earth's space satellites in order to restore TV and Radio broadcasting. The aliens don't like the idea, so they attempt to TOAST the crumpets. It's a wacky idea, but that's the game for you :) - CRUMPETS AT THE READY!
